content: the herringbone half_double_crochet stitch gives such lovely texture and is even more fun when worked in the round after looking at my completed scrunchie i immediately thought of a whimsical little girl that i taught several years ago so it s only fitting that i would name this scrunchie after her rose is not so little anymore but i imagine if i asked her mother she would say that she still loves to twirl this scrunchie is worked in continuous rounds using sport weight yarn and is seamed at the end enclosing a hair elastic the pattern could be made using other weights of yarn just know that the gauge may not match the gauge in the pattern
